mapper.insert: insert into product_mst values( 0, #{product_brand}, #{product_kind}, #{product_name}, #{product_info}, #{product_price}, #{product_amount}, #{product_size}, 0, 0, now(), now() );

insert into product_img_file values
( 0, #{file.product_code}, #{file.file_name}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT pm.product_Code, pm.product_Brand, pm.product_kind, pm.product_name, pm.product_price, pm.product_amount, pm.product_size, pf.file_code, pf.file_name FROM product_mst pm LEFT OUTER JOIN product_img_file pf ON(pf.product_code = pm.product_code) WHERE pm.product_code = pf.product_code;
